item.title: Can AI Understand Emotions The Limits of Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has made staggering advancements in recent years, from diagnosing diseases to composing music. Yet, one question continues to elude even the most sophisticated systems: Can AI truly understand human emotions? While sentiment analysis tools claim to decode feelings from text, speech, or facial expressions, their ability to grasp the nuance of human emotion remains limited.
